title: Introducing: Speelburg
body:
Mixing string sections with choppy, hazy beats more akin to Ben Khan or Oceaán than symphony orchestras, there’s no doubting that **Speelburg** (Noah Sacré) pushes the boat out on his debut track, _Aubrey_.

Feeling like an introduction to his own musical language, it’s diverse and thoroughly enjoyable, whilst hinting at far greater things to come. Check out Aubrey below.

excerpt.full: Mixing string sections with choppy, hazy beats more akin to Ben Khan or Oceaán than symphony orchestras, there’s no doubting that Speelburg (Noah Sacré) pushes the boat out on his debut track, Aubrey. Feeling like an introduction to his own musical language, it’s diverse and thoroughly enjoyable, whilst hinting at far greater things to come. \[…\]
